attributes.action: Ban Alpro's insulting commercial against Christianity
attributes.additional_details:
Alpro has recently launched an advertisement about their almond milk. This video is blatantly mocking the Noah's Ark story.

This video needs to be banned everywhere!

If this was directed to another religion they'll most likely see a very aggressive response forcing them to remove the content. We need to make a stand, to prevent companies doing this in the future. We should also boycott their products until they completely get rid of the video and make an official apology.
